A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Pros
Good special effects 
Cons
Bad writing and plot holes galore. This movie only works because it assumes both sides are stupid. The first order doesn't fire on ships when told to in the opening scene. They don't cut off the escape route of the rebellion by firing upon the ship with all the life forms .. no they fire on
An empty base

A music score that is unremarkable. You won't be humming any of this

Underwhelming characters. Rey can do anything without training. Finn is surprised there is a tracker but doesn't remember this even though he remember mopping the place? Poe get torn down for making the right decisions?  The movie renders  technological terrors mute by weaponzing lightspeed; what's the point of Death Star\, starkiller bases or dreadnuaghts when you can add ftl to an asteroid and really don't care if someone destroys it.

Do yourself a favor\, don't pay to see this. Wait until
It comes to a streaming platform
